note: For each country, trust data is shown for the latest survey wave in the period 2009-2022. Depending on the country and year, inequality data relates to income measured after taxes and benefits, or to consumption, [per capita](#dod:per-capita).
title: Interpersonal trust vs. income inequality
subtitle: Share of respondents agreeing with the statement "Most people can be trusted". The [Gini coefficient](#dod:gini) measures inequality on a scale from 0 to 1. Higher values indicate higher inequality.
